forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 51. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening gracefully unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the air carries a mild, gentle chill hinting at a low around 51 degrees. Under a mostly clear sky, the last hues of daylight are retreating, giving way to a serene night tinged with the promise of tomorrow. A calm southwest wind sweeps through at a soft pace, making it a time for light layers—a light jacket joins the evening’s attire, perfect for those taking a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or settling into a cozy café.

Looking ahead to Monday, sunlight will unveil the city in radiant splendor, with temperatures peaking at a comfortable 63 degrees before shifting toward a cooler afternoon. The breeze will rise, adding an invigorating quality to the day as gusts reach 22 mph. Yet in typical San Francisco fashion, the marine layer could weave its way inland, adding whispers of fog around the fringes of the Golden Gate and along some coastal views. Daytime outings beckon—exploring the local markets or indulging in a quiet moment at Golden Gate Park would feel enchanting amidst this vibrant atmosphere. A day with much to offer, the charm of the city is at hand, inviting one to savor the moments deeply.
